Here is the list of signs in astrology with their corresponding scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural-born leaders, Aries are confident and impulsive, making them high-scoring in many areas.
2. Taurus - 7.5/10 - Practical and reliable, Tauruses excel at building stable foundations, but may lack flexibility.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis thrive on variety and mental stimulation, making them top performers.
4. Cancer - 8.5/10 - Emotionally intelligent and nurturing, Cancers have a strong sense of family and community, scoring well in personal relationships.
5. Leo - 9.5/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos shine bright with their creativity and natural leadership abilities.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Analytical and practical, Virgos excel at details and organization, but may struggle with self-doubt.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and social, Librans value balance and harmony, scoring well in relationships and personal growth.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpios are highly perceptive and committed to their goals, making them strong performers.
9. Sagittarius - 9.5/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians excel at exploration and expansion, often achieving great heights.
10. Capricorn - 8.5/10 - Disciplined and responsible, Capricorns build solid foundations and achieve long-term goals, scoring well in career and finance.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, Aquarians are innovative problem-solvers who thrive on freedom and individuality.
12. Pisces - 8/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, Pisces excel at artistic expression and emotional understanding, but may struggle with boundaries.
Please note that these scores are subjective and based on general astrological insights.
